./

Gsourcedoublet__define.pro


Oseen tensor for a source doublet oriented relative to the plane $z = 0$. $$\mathsf{G}_{\alpha \beta}(\vec{r}) = (1 - 2 \delta_{\beta z}) \, \frac{\partial}{\partial r_\beta} \, \mathsf{G}^\text{stokeslet}_{\alpha \beta}(\vec{r}) $$

Author information

Author

David G. Grier, New York University

Copyright

Copyright (c) 2015 David G. Grier
